pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Geospatial Cartogram Heatmaps // The functionality provided by this package is an expansion of the code of the 'statebins' package, created by B. Rudis (2022), doi:10.32614/CRAN.package.statebins. It allows for the creation of square choropleths for the entire world, provided an appropriate specified grid is supplied.
